'''''Did My Hand Fall From My Wrist?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series IV]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Thunderhelm Lawachurl]] while in an enhanced state.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The achievement can also be unlocked if a teammate clears the condition during [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name is a reference to a line from ''{{w|Game of Thrones}}''.
